content: A mixture of Mn­(OAc)2·4H2O (0.5 mmol, 123 mg), LiNO3 (0.5 mmol, 35 mg), H2TBIP (1 mmol, 222 mg), and DMF (10 mL) were sealed in a 20 mL of Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel. The mixture was heated to 160 °C in 4 h and maintained at 160 °C for 48 h, and then cooled slowly to room temperature. Colorless prismatic crystals of 1 were collected (yielding 194 mg, 86% based on MnII). Anal. calcd. (%) for 1 C60H76O20N4Li2Mn3 (1351.97): C 53.30, N 4.14, H 5.67. Found: C 52.82, N 4.03, H 5.71. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3490 w, 2966 m, 2906 vw, 2870 vw, 1694 w, 1678 w, 1661 vs, 1620 w, 1611 w, 1572 s, 1554 vw, 1460 vw, 1435 s, 1495 m, 1381 vs, 1311 w, 1274 w, 1184 vw, 914 vw, 869 vw, 830 w, 822 w, 780 s, 755 m, 731 m, 721 m, 695 w, 677 w, 581 w, 519 w.
clean_text:
Preparation of Samples

A mixture of Mn(OAc)2⋅4H2O (0.5 mmol, 123 mg), LiNO3 (0.5 mmol, 35 mg), H2TBIP (1 mmol, 222 mg), and DMF (10 mL) were sealed in a 20 mL of Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel. The mixture was heated to 160 °C in 4 h and maintained at 160 °C for 48 h, and then cooled slowly to room temperature. Colorless prismatic crystals of 1 were collected (yielding 194 mg, 86% based on MnII). Anal. calcd. (%) for 1 C60H76O20N4Li2Mn3 (1351.97): C 53.30, N 4.14, H 5.67. Found: C 52.82, N 4.03, H 5.71. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3490 w, 2966 m, 2906 vw, 2870 vw, 1694 w, 1678 w, 1661 vs, 1620 w, 1611 w, 1572 s, 1554 vw, 1460 vw, 1435 s, 1495 m, 1381 vs, 1311 w, 1274 w, 1184 vw, 914 vw, 869 vw, 830 w, 822 w, 780 s, 755 m, 731 m, 721 m, 695 w, 677 w, 581 w, 519 w.
